projects.name: PROJECT FIVES
projects.description: Project Fives presents an innovative 3D basketball shoe art display, embodying the fusion of athletic performance and artistic expression. This exhibit features five distinct basketball shoes, each uniquely designed with a blend of vibrant colors, intricate patterns, and cutting-edge materials. All are inspired by nature, with organic textures and earthy tones, signifying endurance and resilience.

quotes.text: Be in a mindset of ongoing research. The key to happiness is to be in a mind state with space to always be learning. A way to get here consistently is to read and write
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: The secret of achievement is to hold a picture of a successful outcome in mind
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I can do anything I put my mind to with the help of the universe
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: If the good guys didn't win, we'd have nothing to believe in
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Life is about loving and learning and creating and exploring and adventuring
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Get high and learn about what you're interested in with chatgpt
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Another key to happiness: do things one at a time with diligence
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: The way you get better at doing anything is by doing it
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Waking up to an alarm is purely against the Buddhist monk avatar ways of life because it means you're so deeply attached to something in the real world, something as fundamental as the time of day and where the Sun is compared to the earth.
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: If you're guided by the spirit of honest inquiry and every word you say is reflective of what you believe to be the truth then the pathway you walk on is a golden pathway to success, and I know that to be true
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: You become articulate by paying attention to what you say
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Mindfulness is the direct path to realization
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Take edibles not to explore nor to experience but rather to brainstorm, create and subsequently learn
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Lack of confidence come from not working hard on the things you care about, true confidence comes from overcoming your fears and doing hard things on purpose
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Inspiration is the most highly concentrated and potent form of energy elixir
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Develop a calm and peaceful philosophy of living
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Practice serenity
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: You are what you eat, read, and listen to.
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Creativity is the highest form of intelligence
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I believe today is an amazing day. I believe I can successfully overcome any obstacle that arises. I am happy to be alive. I feel amazing physically, mentally, and spiritually. I am grateful for all that I have had, all that I have currently, and all that I will have. I thank the universe for its wonderful creations and infinite wisdom to explore. I believe today is an amazing day. Namaste
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: The world programs you to believe that money is the most scare resource, but there is infinite money out there if you have a good idea. The real scarcity is new ideas and competent execution.
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: If the universe is for us, who can be against us?
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Intention is the cure
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Why is learning so addicting?
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Memorization is not the same as understanding
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: It's crucial to understand your likes and dislikes. Ranking things and making tier lists are ways to solidity your thoughts and beliefs
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: My artistic medium of choice is on the computer where I can experiment freely and reversibly
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Imagination is the most powerful tool of the mind and the key to manifestation
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I daydream professionally
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Increasing my net girth
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Things we mustn't forget: Everything happens for a reason, trust the universe, We can do anything we put our minds to, The point of life is love, friendship, and art, a negative, overwhelmed, stressed, pessimistic mindset is temporary
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: The problem of what makes up our reality and its origin frustrates me and leaves me continuously curious, so it's my destiny to solve it
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: The mind needs space to breathe
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: It's unbelievable that we are living in a time of pre-human unification
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: The point of life is love, friendship, and the constant journey of bettering oneself and the lifelong commitment to learning
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: The universe wants to help you, the universe wants to see you win. Keeping putting in effort and the universe will keep guiding you in the right direction.
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: If we believe psychedelics are avenues to deeper realities, then it does not matter if they truly are or are not, as we gain the same perspective and experiences from it regardless
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Practice is the hardest part of learning, and training is the essence of transformation.
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: The muse will visit but she has to find you working
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Artistic confidence can be lifted by regularly creating art and sharing it into the world
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Artists are like gods in the sense that their main magic is creation
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Our reality is a veil, an illusion draped over collective consciousness
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Don't get high if doing an implementation task where you need to complete something on time, but if you're doing an exploration/research task OR an implementation task where you have time and space to explore & research off track you will actually gain deeper insights about what you are implementing
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: In moments of challenge or fear, blood turns to liquid gold and fills my veins with the courage and strength to defeat all enemies
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Time spent in flow state is the key to happiness.
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Don't focus on sales, focus on building a good product and it will sell itself
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Change brings with it the opportunity for growth
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I appreciate and enjoy the cross-pollination between the realms of art and science
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: A good man does what's right, while a great man inspires others to do the same
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Reverse engineer the feeling that gave you inspiration
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I'm attracted to doing what I'm interested in like a magnet
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: most people don't know what they are interested in because they have no space to explore
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I enjoy using both halves of my brain evenly - 50% art 50% engineering
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: The fastest way to learn is by exploring the thing you are most currently interested in
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Its more fun learning to apply it
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Life is an ongoing CTF where the flag is money.
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: How is earth not internally aligned yet.
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: You can do anything you put your mind to
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Pen and paper is not the most efficient tool for note-taking/brainstorming, but should not be fully dismissed as it can act as a powerful initial idea catalyst.
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I am interested in the brain for the same reason I am interested in computers
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I want to master everything I'm good at. Who wouldn't?
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Trying to master higher art forms (painting, graphic design, storyboarding) before mastering the basic building blocks of drawing is like trying to write a new protocol without knowing Solidity
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Success is the moment you feel good enough about a creation you've made to share it in the world
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Time is a blessing, a new day is a new opportunity
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I must ensure I maintain my childlike curiosity, excitement about life, an openness to the new, and a beginners mindset.
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I'm open to new ideas but biased towards my own, I need to reframe this balance to be more open to other ideas
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Never become reliant on caffeine to function
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Failure is the information you need to get where you're going
quotes.author: Rick Ruben

quotes.text: Excitement is the best barometer for selecting with seeds of ideas to focus on
quotes.author: Rick Ruben

quotes.text: Art is not a competition, it's a journey of self-expression and exploration.
quotes.author: Rick Ruben

quotes.text: I want to spend my professional life creating, developing my creative vision, and enhancing my creative abilities while utilizing the current & future tools (blender, ai, text-to-animated movie, etc. as they improve) rather than focusing on trying to make these new tools myself (for the same reason we don't try to make our own ZK prover because many teams of experts are already racing to do the work for us for free)
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Stop comparing yourself to other people, only compare your progress to your previous self
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: if (inTrustedEnvironment && !isImplementationTask { getHigh(); }
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Drugs are tools when used for doing purely creative work, brainstorming, or exploration based tasks, or trying to enhance an experience or consumption of art for inspiration or learning purposes, otherwise they are vices
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Even in a world of over saturation, truly impactful art can cut through the noise
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: When you are a child the entire world captures you in a dream like awe of curiosity
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I just tell the truth, and the truth sounds crazy in a world full of lies
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.text: Clouds are a suspiciously convenient way of redistributing the most critical resource for all life
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Don't get high when you have an implementation task to do. Only get high when you can free roam/play, brainstorm, and think freely
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: It is the responsibility of any serious artist to pay attention to inspiration wherever it may strike, harvest its pure energy, and bathe in it for as long as possible.
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Epiphanies materialize instantly and often in the most ordinary moments
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: All you've got to do is plant that seed in your mind, care for it, work steadily at your goal and it will become a reality. It not only will, there is no way it cannot
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: You become what you think about.
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: The paper money + metal coin combination monetary system is unbelievably troll
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: The Internet can be used for purposeful exploring or mindless wandering
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: wise means one has a high average outcome across all situations - smart means one does spectacularly well in a few.
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Genius is often perseverance in disguise
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Do things right when you are inspired to do them, otherwise the inspiration will fade away and you'll forget why you even wanted to start
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Most of my memories are in 3rd person
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I'm often distracted while consuming art (especially movies/TV) because I'm thinking about how the artist made it
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I prefer thinking over not thinking (about drinking)
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: People's playstyle for life reveals information about yourself
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I'm driven and inspired by science, technology, and art - not business
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Art and creation are the meaning of life, being an artist allows you to see the beauty in everything and enriches all aspects of living.
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Being able to share the discussion of art and create together with a loved one is what gives endless meaning to a relationship
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I'm the Lebron James of coding I need my body taken care of
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Reincarnation is a reallocation of RAM
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I am an artist, physicist, and philosopher in all domains
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I was atheist until I realized I am god
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I can literally feel the electricity moving throughout my brain when I'm really high thinking or solving problems using GPU/CPU heavy algorithms
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I love fighting authority when they're wrong
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Know when to talk but know when to be quiet
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I love and need to practice imagination and visualization
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: You must always genuinely and independently ask yourself the question you ask others before they respond
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Doing things that scare you makes you temporarily insecure until you succeed
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I need to be the curator of different museums. You have to be an expert on the topic to design it well
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: The cure for depression is creation
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I only do what I want to, but that often means doing things I don't want to now to achieve bigger things I want to later
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: True alchemy is transforming hell into heaven
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I'm always in heaven because even when I'm in hell I enjoy battling demons
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: The duality of life, with its moments of joy and suffering, render the concept of an afterlife unnecessary. We are already living in a state of both heaven and hell, determined by our own mindset and perception of the world around us.
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: They key to happiness is mindset
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Nothing is hard if you're good at learning
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: The computer truly is the bicycle of the mind
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I create extra time in the day by both learning and implementing in 2x speed
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: ðŸ„ => focus/reflection/empathy/honesty/inspiration, ðŸ => exploration/realization/synthesis/simulations/brainstorming
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I run sims to see into the future. Once I see into the future I can see how to prepare for it and the steps that lead there
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I ask questions when I think
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I often wonder how shit works then learn how it was made by answering my own question with a reasonable guess
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I've found that anything I can imagine becomes reality
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: whats harder than finding the answer is often finding the right question to ask
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Being attentive, dynamic, and persistent is key
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: If I lived forever I would take over the world It's just an equation with time as a variable
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: I'm going to be the new Rothschild family of the cyberspace world by building my crypto legacy now like same with gold rush and Russian oligarchs
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: The amount of money you make in any sector is in chronological order
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Life and business is a logarithmic graph with time as the x axis and you can exchange time on the x for money
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: My job is to think and I'm on the clock
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Life isn't fair and you're either the ones making the rules or the ones okay with it not being fair
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Wealth is completely 100% all luck. Working hard just increases your odds
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Our generation picks the most random waste of time hills to die on
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: People who care too strongly about any one topic have have low EQ
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Life is just day trading time
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Life is a blockchain and you get rewarded by the amount of sleep you get bro you get sleep tokens. The more you sleep and recharge you get a scalar multiplier of how your mood will be affected the next day, if you don't recharge enough you earn less tokens and are grumpy and tired and perform poorly. You're literally rewarded for sleeping bro it's a proof of recharge blockchain ecosystem
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Time travel is possible the only thing that is holding us back is our maximum computing power because if you had enough computing power you could simulate physics and every aspect of our universe so well that you could represent it perfectly in a simulation forwards and backwards does being able to construct a timeline backwards of how history actually played out and then construct a virtual world based off of that and use the same physics to simulate the world forward as well
quotes.author: TB

quotes.text: Those of lower EQ can be differenciated by observing whose mind's could or could not be replaced by robots today
quotes.author: TB
